What's new?

Jump to navigation Jump to search

[chatnet] Retard says, So what's new?

Glad you asked, retard. Let's give you a rundown.

New Content

  • Over 100 new weapons.
  • Over 75 new pieces of armor and bits of clothing.
  • Over 50 new crafting recipes to discover.
  • Several new areas and upgrades to old areas.
  • Several new jobs.
  • Several new quests and journals to discover.
  • Brand spanking new raid areas to test the mettle of you and your corp.
  • Multiple newly implemented mutations including Robot, an extension to Ripper, that fuck weapon you always wanted, and new focus mutations.
  • Several new trophies to flex your ingame achievements.
  • Several new clothing items

Changes To Old Content

  • A persistent XP system. (See: help reroll) You only keep 25% of your total xp over rerolls, same as old Hell.
  • Chance to reduce armor durability on repair has been reduced significantly. Repair your armor without fear.
  • Implants aren't damaged on death (though damaged implants will cause increased stress)
  • Focus has had a complete overhaul and utilizes a psi point system.
  • A new poise system to replace the traditional guaranteed stun.
  • Parry & dodge interaction has been fixed. A failure to parry is no longer an automatic hit.
  • Dodging has been adjusted to be a lot less overpowered
  • Buffed minimum damage for various two-handed melee weapons
  • Early game weapons rebalanced to be little less shit.
  • Various armors rebalanced to be a lot less shit.
  • Buffed some weapon classes to be more viable
    • Several new flails
    • Several new throwing weapons
    • Fishing weapons have increased damage scaling
    • New bow weapons covered by Quickdraw
    • New focus weapons
  • Most of the old weapons have been rebalanced.
    • Increased skill and brawn scaling for blades
    • Reduced scaling for some whips
    • Pistols+Rifles skills merged into Firearms and no longer have scaling.
  • Some weapons have new flavor text for drawing, stowing, and power attacks
  • Buffed burn and EMP damage. Laser damage is out.
  • The IP grind is out. I too enjoy standing in one spot for six hours until I can play the game.
  • Feinting is out. Sorry, your weapons are good and actually obtainable now so suck your mum.
  • Vampire and Empath are out. Sorry, I like it when you play the game.
  • Buffs to every racial mutation and a few others.
  • Money is much more important, most things are purchaseable, albeit significantly more expensive.
  • Aiming AT players removed in light of the rebalancing. Aiming to doors still in and encouraged.
  • Completely new stress and implant systems.
  • Headbutt revamped to be a little less homosexual to use.
